original: intros H. destruct (Zp_prime_invert _ _ Hp' (Zp_invertible_prime n (conj (Nat.lt_le_incl _ _ (Nat.lt_lt_succ_r _ _ (proj1 H))) (Nat.le_lt_trans _ _ _ (le_refl _) (proj2 H))) Hzero_one)) as [m Hm]. exists m. split. - apply nat2Zp_surj with (u := 〚 m 〛). rewrite <- Hm, inv_inj. apply H. - specialize (nat2Zp_choose m) as [[Hm'|[Hm'|[Hm'|]]]|[m' [Hm1 Hm2]]]; try contradiction. apply Nat.lt_lt_sub_r; rewrite Hm', <- Hm. apply Nat.lt_trans with (S (p - 1)); auto.
